name: Listic-ShoppingListShared
0:
”Alexa, add tomatoes to the "list name" list”
”Alexa, create a list called "list name"”
”Alexa, remove the product "product name" from the "list name" list”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
First, download the Listic - Shopping List Shared App from the Play Store and create a user account. Activate this skill and link the account you just created.
Once you have linked your account and accepted the permissions, the lists and products that you have created in the Listic - Shopping List Shared App will be linked in Alexa.
Start dictating your products to Alexa and they will automatically appear in the Listic - Shopping List Shared App!
